languages.text:
Старые пряхи сплетают нить вюрда жестоко,
Не вопрошая и не принимая мольбы.
Бросил свой взгляд Громогласный Ульфар и ясно увидел..."

The old spinners weave
the wyrd-thread cruelly,
no enquiries or entreaties accepting.
Ulfar Thunderlung cast his gaze
and clearly he beheld..."
languages.original_text:
Старые пряхи сплетают нить вюрда жестоко,
Не вопрошая и не принимая мольбы.
Бросил свой взгляд Громогласный Ульфар и ясно увидел..."

Ulfar Thunderlung cast his gaze

The old spinners weave
the wyrd-thread cruelly,
no enquiries or entreaties accepting.
Ulfar Thunderlung cast his gaze
and clearly he beheld..."

languages.text:
年老いた紡ぎ手は
残酷な運命の糸を編み
問いも懇願も受け入れない。
ウルファー・サンダーラングは視線を投げかけ
その目ではっきりと見た…」
languages.original_text:
The old spinners weave
the wyrd-thread cruelly,
no enquiries or entreaties accepting.
Ulfar Thunderlung cast his gaze
and clearly he beheld..."

traits.locale_text:
年老いた紡ぎ手は
残酷な運命の糸を編み
問いも懇願も受け入れない。
ウルファー・サンダーラングは視線を投げかけ
その目ではっきりと見た…」

languages.text:
“白发苍苍的女神，
编织着残酷的命运，
不回答任何询问，
也不同情任何恳求。
乌尔法·雷狼清楚地看到……”
languages.original_text:
The old spinners weave
the wyrd-thread cruelly,
no enquiries or entreaties accepting.
Ulfar Thunderlung cast his gaze
and clearly he beheld..."

traits.locale_text:
“白发苍苍的女神，
编织着残酷的命运，
不回答任何询问，
也不同情任何恳求。
乌尔法·雷狼清楚地看到……”

languages.text:
« Les vieilles fileuses tissent
cruellement le fil du wyrd,
sourdes aux suppliques des infortunés.
Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre lança alors un regard
qui lui révéla clairement... »
languages.original_text:
The old spinners weave
the wyrd-thread cruelly,
no enquiries or entreaties accepting.
Ulfar Thunderlung cast his gaze
and clearly he beheld..."

traits.locale_text:
« Les vieilles fileuses tissent
cruellement le fil du wyrd,
sourdes aux suppliques des infortunés.
Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre lança alors un regard
qui lui révéla clairement... »

languages.text:
Las viejas hilanderas tejen
el hilo del sino con crueldad,
sin ceder a súplicas ni demandas.
Ulfar Pulmón Atronador levantó la mirada
y vio con claridad...».
languages.original_text:
The old spinners weave
the wyrd-thread cruelly,
no enquiries or entreaties accepting.
Ulfar Thunderlung cast his gaze
and clearly he beheld..."

traits.locale_text:
Las viejas hilanderas tejen
el hilo del sino con crueldad,
sin ceder a súplicas ni demandas.
Ulfar Pulmón Atronador levantó la mirada
y vio con claridad...».

languages.text:
Die alten Spinner weben
den Wyrd-Faden grausam,
akzeptieren keine Bitten, kein Flehen.
Ulfar Donnerlunge lenkte seinen Blick
und ganz deutlich sah er ..."
languages.original_text:
The old spinners weave
the wyrd-thread cruelly,
no enquiries or entreaties accepting.
Ulfar Thunderlung cast his gaze
and clearly he beheld..."

languages.text:
Ne soru ne de niyaz kabul eden
Yaşlı çıkrıkçılar, örmüş
Kader ağını acımasızca.
Ulfar Tufanciğer dikkatle
Çevirdi bakışlarını..."
languages.original_text:
The old spinners weave
the wyrd-thread cruelly,
no enquiries or entreaties accepting.
Ulfar Thunderlung cast his gaze
and clearly he beheld..."

traits.locale_text:
Yaşlı çıkrıkçılar örmüş,
kader ağını acımasızca.
Hiçbir soru ve niyazı kabul etmeden.
Ulfar Tufanciğer dikkatle
bakışlarını çevirdi..."
